relation: Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
Tortillas! My first football game here that is all you will see but is super fun and a great experience.

I don't waste my money as fast as if i were going to a much bigger city. So I could go 2 to 3 weeks without spending. It is a bit pricey staying in the dorms but it is worth it. You meet so many people and friends that will help you when you need it.
Yes kingsville is fairly small but on campus there are so many things that are going on or clubs you could join. Being with friends and having a movie night is great and isnt a money waster either.

Bishop/Turner dining is great I actually love the food here. You can eat there in the cafeteria (all you can eat) or take it to go if you have homework or just don't feel like eating there. Its great food everyday.

I live in bishop hall which is right across lynch. People use to always tell me to watch out for the parties and loud music all night. Total lie, it is great i actually love where my room is and my neighbors.
First time students may think that because of the size of the campus the professors are more laid back. Don't be fooled. tamuk has a great academic program it is challenging so don't miss class!
Talk to someone that has been here whether it be a relative or visiting the campus to talk to someone. Help is fantastic here, don't let the size put you down.

A lot of help academically with every subject which makes homework, quizzes or homework so much easier to do. People are nice and friendly. Community service and organizations to join isn't hard to find here.
pageTitle: Texas A & M University-Kingsville Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {83618=The food and dining is awful and there are several that agree. The food is supposed to be home-like food but it is not. The dining room seems empty due to the food. There are times were the food is actually food but most of the time it is not. Sad fact is the price is about 1200 for a meal plan which is also over priced for food you cannot stand to eat three times a day seven days a week., 9447=All the professors here know how to teach students very well and keep learning interesting. I have a really awesome professor for History 1302, who I chose again for enjoying his 1301 class last semester, who constantly challenges us and keeps us interested. My English 1301 teacher is also my 1302 teacher because I chose to have him again. These are only two professors out of many and I am looking forward to meeting the rest and learning all that I can from them. Practically every teacher here has written a book on their studies and have earned their doctorates, so they are definitely credible in my opinion., 84292=The dorm life is ridiculous. The prices are too high. paying 3300 for a dorm is just a little too much and that is for the nicest one. Also the fact the the cheapest is about 1800 and honestly should be a lot less for what your living in. The room is not even up to date to be at that price. That is more than taking a full schedule of classes which does not seem right., 4518=I not sure yet I start Aug. 2009, 255971=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}

textAfterTable: Great for these types of students I not sure yet I start Aug. 2009 Tips for prospective students Yes, since this campus must be the cheapest because it is associated with the community colleges. Will enjoy being here The only downfall is that it is not much internet based. I really need more internet classes. Will learn a lot This is a small based campus. I do expect to learn since there are going to be small classes.
